name: Magnetik (itch)
description:
In this game you play as a robot who has the skill to generate a electric field and attract or repulse a magnet presented in each level. The goal is to make the magnet reach its right target, sometimes there will be multiple magnets and here is where the puzzle gets more exciting. 

Enemies, blocks, keys, treadmills, holes, teleportation, levers and many more items combine make each level unique. It is up to you how to solve each puzzle, whether using ambient objects or not. 

Have Fun!
